data.name: CreateDatabaseZipped
data.value: 
data.comment: GZIP script of the SQL database schema and tables. (try http://www.txtwizard.net/compression for decompression)

data.name: DropDatabaseZipped
data.value: H4sIAAAAAAAA/3MJ8g9QCHb2cPV1VPB0U3CN8AwOCVYoLk0qTi7KLCjJzM8rVnB2DHZ2dHG15nLBqjg5qYyQktSC5EyC5iSWpmSWEFJUWpxahG6SW6ifc4invx8uD+iVFqQklqTGowhaAwD9IG4I+gAAAA==

data.name: EventQuery
data.value: SELECT request.record_time as capture_time, event.id, event_type as type, event.record_time as event_time, action, read_point, event_timezone_offset, disposition, business_location, business_step, transformation_id, event_id FROM epcis.event JOIN epcis.request on request.id = event.request_id /**where**/ /**orderby**/ LIMIT @limit

data.name: RelatedQuery
StoreBusinessTransaction
data.value: INSERT INTO epcis.business_transaction(event_id, transaction_type, transaction_id) VALUES (@EventId, @Type, @Id);

data.name: StoreCustomField
data.value: INSERT INTO epcis.custom_field(event_id, field_id, parent_id, namespace, name, type, text_value, numeric_value, date_value) VALUES (@EventId, @Id, @ParentId, @Namespace, @Name, @Type, @TextValue, @NumericValue, @DateValue);

data.name: StoreEpcs
data.value: INSERT INTO epcis.epc(event_id, epc, type, is_quantity, quantity, unit_of_measure) VALUES (@EventId, @Id, @Type, @IsQuantity, @Quantity, @UnitOfMeasure);

data.name: StoreErrorDeclaration
data.value: INSERT INTO epcis.error_declaration(event_id, declaration_time, reason) VALUES(@EventId, @DeclarationTime, @Reason);

data.name: StoreErrorDeclarationIds
data.value: INSERT INTO epcis.error_declaration_eventid(event_id, corrective_eventid) VALUES(@EventId, @CorrectiveId);

data.name: StoreEvent
data.value: INSERT INTO epcis.event(id, request_id, record_time, action, event_type, event_timezone_offset, business_location, business_step, disposition, read_point, transformation_id, event_id) VALUES(@Id, @RequestId, @EventTime, @Action, @Type, @EventTimeZoneOffset, @BusinessLocation, @BusinessStep, @Disposition, @ReadPoint, @TransformationId, @EventId);

data.name: StoreRequest
data.value: INSERT INTO epcis.request(id, document_time, record_time) VALUES(@Id, @DocumentTime, @RecordTime);

data.name: StoreSourceDestination
data.value: INSERT INTO epcis.source_destination(event_id, type, source_dest_id, direction) VALUES (@EventId, @Type, @Id, @Direction);

data.name: SubscriptionStore
data.value: INSERT INTO subscriptions.subscription(id, subscription_id, trigger, initial_record_time, report_if_empty, destination, query_name, active, schedule_seconds, schedule_minutes, schedule_hours, schedule_month, schedule_day_of_month, schedule_day_of_week) VALUES(@Id, @SubscriptionId, @Trigger, @InitialRecordTime, @ReportIfEmpty, @Destination, @QueryName, @Active, @Second, @Minute, @Hour, @Month, @DayOfMonth, @DayOfWeek);

data.name: SubscriptionAcknowledgePendingRequests
data.value: DELETE FROM subscriptions.pendingrequest WHERE subscription_id = @SubscriptionId AND request_id = ANY(@RequestId);

data.name: SubscriptionDelete
data.value: DELETE from subscriptions.subscription WHERE id = @Id;

data.name: SubscriptionListIds
data.value: SELECT s.id, s.subscription_id, s.query_name, s.active FROM subscriptions.subscription s

data.name: SubscriptionListPendingRequestIds
data.value: SELECT request_id FROM subscriptions.pendingrequest WHERE subscription_id = @SubscriptionId;

data.name: SubscriptionsList
data.value: SELECT s.id, s.destination, s.subscription_id, s.query_name, s.active, s.trigger, s.report_if_empty, s.schedule_minutes, s.schedule_seconds, s.schedule_hours, s.schedule_month, s.schedule_day_of_month, s.schedule_day_of_week FROM subscriptions.subscription s;

data.name: SubscriptionStoreParameter
data.value: INSERT INTO subscriptions.parameter(id, subscription_id, name) VALUES(@Id, @SubscriptionId, @Name);

data.name: SubscriptionStoreParameterValue
data.value: INSERT INTO subscriptions.parameter_value(id, parameter_id, value) VALUES(@Id, @ParameterId, @Value);

data.name: SubscriptionListParameters
data.value: SELECT p.subscription_id, p.name, pv.value FROM subscriptions.parameter p INNER JOIN subscriptions.parameter_value pv ON pv.parameter_id = p.id;

data.name: MasterDataAttributeInsert
data.value: INSERT INTO cbv.attribute(masterdata_id, masterdata_type, id, value) VALUES(@ParentId, @ParentType, @Id, @Value) ON CONFLICT ON CONSTRAINT pk_cbv_masterdata_attribute DO UPDATE SET value = @Value;

data.name: MasterDataInsert
data.value: INSERT INTO cbv.masterdata(id, type, created_on, last_update) VALUES(@Id, @Type, NOW(), NOW()) ON CONFLICT ON CONSTRAINT pk_cbv_masterdata DO UPDATE SET last_update = NOW();

data.name: MasterDataQuery
data.value: SELECT md.type, md.id FROM cbv.masterdata md /**where**/ ORDER BY md.last_update DESC LIMIT @limit

data.name: UserLoadByName
data.value: SELECT id, username, password FROM users.user WHERE username = @Username;

data.name: MasterDataHierarchyInsert
data.value: INSERT INTO cbv.hierarchy(type, parent_id, children_id) VALUES(@Type, @ParentId, @ChildrenId);

data.name: MasterDataAttributeFieldInsert
data.value: INSERT INTO cbv.attribute_field(internal_id, internal_parent_id, masterdata_id, masterdata_type, parent_id, name, namespace, value) VALUES(@Id, @InternalParentId, @MasterdataId, @MasterdataType, @ParentId, @Name, @Namespace, @Value);

data.name: MasterDataDelete
data.value: DELETE FROM cbv.attribute_field WHERE masterdata_type = @Type AND masterdata_id = @Id; DELETE FROM cbv.hierarchy WHERE type = @Type AND (parent_id = @Id OR children_id = @Id); DELETE FROM cbv.attribute WHERE masterdata_id = @Id AND masterdata_type = @Type; DELETE FROM cbv.masterdata WHERE id = @Id AND type = @Type;
